panadura- pinhena niwasak watalu polisiya eeye(15) ganja mili gram 200k ha jangama durakathana 16k samaga pudgalayan dedenek athadanguwata gaththa.mowun awu 20 ha 25 wayaswala pasuwannan.pasal daruwanta asabhya widiyo pata beda harimata mema jangama durakathana thabagena sitiye dayi polisiya saka karanawa.mema jangama durakathana 16 , pasal lamayinge wiya haki bawada polisiya saka karana bawayi apa warthakaru pawasuwe.kesewethath eka jangama durakathanayaka wides jathikayan peni sitina asabhya darshana thibu bawa sandahan.mema durakathana pasal sisungen laba gena eewata asabhya widiyo athulu kara mudal garime jawaramak kriyathmaka wuye dayi polisiya parikshana pawathwanawa.

dantha dhathun wahansege rakawaranaya, janathawage ha sambuddha shasanaye unnathiya sanga sasune punarudaya, bududahame ha sahithya kala athulu shasthriya anshaye athi kala diyunuwa, krushikarmanthaya, warimarga, weherawiharawala athiwu pragathiya wani imahath sewawan rasakata urumakam kiyana kurunagala purawaraya eda sitama hasthi shailapura, athugalpura washayenda handinwe.nagarika, ardhanagarika ha gramiya pradeshayangen yuth thiragandahaya naenganahira, thiragandahaya batahira, mahagalbada megoda, wallawa saha kudagalbada yana korala pahenda ema korala athulath kurunagala, mallawapitiya, maspotha yana pradeshiya lekam kottasa thunenda, wargakilomitar 371k wu bhumi pramanayakinda samanwitha karunagala pradeshiya sabha bala pradeshaya, wi gowithana ha sambandha krushikarmika, pol ha rabar wani pradhana wawili wagawangen yuthu wiyali ha theth kalapiya, sashi්raka pradeshayaki.”saubhagyamath shri lankawak - subha anagathayak” ha “aadaraniya purawarayak” dakma karagath kurunagala pradeshiya sabhawa athigaru janadhipathithumage mahinda chinthana wada piliwele aasiyawe aashcharyawath ratak bawata pathkirime gamanedi purogami mehewaraka nirathawa pradeshaye janathawage aarthika, samajayiya, aagamika wani anshawala shighra sanwardhana mawathaka gaman karamin sitina bawata sadhaka emata ya.2006 – 2010 pradeshiya sabha palana kalaya thula karyala paripalanaya ha aadayam ha mulya thaththwaya manalesa kalamanakaranaya karamin dushkara ha gramiya marga sanwardhanaya, withi pahan nadaththu sewawan, wadihiti, lama, tharuna, kantha subha sadhana katayuthu, parisarika ha saukhya sanrakshanaya, mathdrawya niwaranaya, pusthakala, prajashala, krida piti, lama udyana, sathipolawal, paniya jala wyapruthi, susana bhumi, aadi podu pahasukam ha praja sanwardhana wadasatahan wiwidha pathikada osse sanwardhanaya kaleya.manthriwaru 22kin yuthu kurunagala pradeshiya sabhawe sabhapathi dhuraya daramin deshabandu patrik karunasinha mahathage sewaya bala pradeshayata pamanak nowa samastha lanka pradeshiya sabha sabhapathiwarunge sammelanaye jathika sanwidhayaka dhuraya da dakwa widaranaya kereyi.pradeshaye janathawage mulika awashyathawayak wana jalaya sapayima sandaha podu lin idikirimata amatharawa paniya jalaya sandaha wayambaa palath sabhawe ha kurunagala pradeshiya sabhawe dayakathwaya athiwa aarambha karana lada praja jala sampadana wyapruthiya yatathe pallandeniya gurulapola, bodhigama, kudumbuwa, hewapola, werawalla, yana pradeshawala ru. 3,62,30,250/=ka asthamenthugatha watinakamakin yuth jala wyapruthi 6k kriyathmaka kara atha.
